name: Justicar
description: Standing tall within the Agents of Light are the Justicars, sentinels of the Arclight exemplifying its strongest virtues. It is not enough to serve as an example for only mortals, for even divine soldiers need inspiration.

wikiSkinData.lore: Chief among the Arclight stand the Justicars, sentinels who serve as living embodiments of justice and order. Syndra embodies knowledge, for what guides the world if not the wisdom of gods?
Chief among the Arclight stand the Justicars, sentinels who serve as living embodiments of justice and order. Aatrox embodies power, for it is his martial prowess that holds the chaos back.
